channel.title: Proximity
channel.description:
[ul][list][list][center][shadow=black,left][font=impact][size=60pt]Proximity[/size][/font][/shadow] [ [url=http://proximity-rs.com]http://proximity-rs.com[/url] ] [img]http://imageshack.us/m/535/9650/sampletq.png[/img] [/center]
[font=verdana][shadow=#9cc,bottom][s]The goal of [b]Proximity[/b] is to be as unique as possible, we'll contain a wide verity of different types of gameplay for all types of players. Although most of our content and priority will be focused around a pvp system on which we have come up with. It will keep both the original sense of Runescape pking, with an addictive addition. We'll also have regular skilling and pvm for those who aren't interested in pvp, or simply just looking for a break from pking.
For the time being the client, gfx, and website are being developed by Alex(Mr GigGles), and the server by Ashton. Both of us were the original developers of [b]OverloadX[/b] back in its prime around December. We both have experience in running a successfully large scale server and plan to make this one even better! At the moment there isn't much media of what we have completed, and some of which we aren't showing until release. We are currently in alpha stages, and should be in a very early beta within a month. The clients deop is 317, with 602 animations and gfx, 641 items, 508 maps, 562 npcs. The server is PI based.[/s]
Update: I haven't spoken with Ashton(Server coder) since the start of this project and I'm currently unsure if hes still in. So atm I'm the only one working on it. I've decided to change around my plans and just make this a regular server. Unfortunately I can't do everything which I wanted. Instead I've decided to use my OverloadX server, I've transferd the new login screen and have it working 100%, aswell I have made a very large custom home, the size of draynor! I will be posting pictures once its complete!
Thank you for reading! :D[/shadow][/font]
[size=12pt]List of content.[/size] [list] [li]█ New login screen[/li] [li]█ [s]New pvp system[/s][/li] [li]█ Domain purchased[/li] [li]█ [s]Features for the new pvp system[/s][/li] [li]█ New interfaces[/li] [list] [li]█ [s]Pvp Interface[/s][/li] [li]█ [s]Achivement Interface[/s][/li] [li]█ Login Interface[/li] [li]█ Portal Interface[/li] [/list] [li]█ Fixing small errors and bugs[/li] [li]█ Multiple worlds[/li] [li]█ Minigames[/li] [list] [li]█ Duel Arena[/li] [li]█ Castle Wars[/li] [li]█ Custom Pvp Minigame[/li] [/list] [li]█ SQL and Database features[/li] [list] [li]█ Hiscores[/li] [li]█ Vote 4 Reward[/li] [li]█ Auto Donation[/li] [/list] [li]█ Training areas[/li] [list] [li]█ Skilling Area[/li] [li]█ Bosses[/li] [li]█ Regular and slayer areas[/li] [/list] [li]█ Home area[/li] [li]█ Shops, reward system[/li] [li]█ Webclient[/li] [li]█ DEDI setup[/li] [li]█ Beta testing[/li][/list] [size=12pt]Content which might be added[/size] [list][li]█ My Zoom buttons, I may change it around some[/li] [li]█ Fullscreen, depends on how many requests we get[/li] [li]█ [s]Maybe a few non weapon or armor based custom items depending on requests[/s][/li] [/list]
[center][size=28pt][b][ Media ][/b][/size] Login screen: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uQ2K2OU-7DQ]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uQ2K2OU-7DQ[/url]
Sample picture of new custom home area, still only about 50% done. [img]http://img838.imageshack.us/img838/42/unledvy.png[/img] [/center][/list][/list][/ul]

item.title: Proximity
item.dc:creator: @overloadx2 overloadx2
item.description:
@overloadx2 wrote:

[quote=“Ashton51, post:18, topic:395738”]Lol,

Looks nice and I saw this on your MSN status

I’ve been MSN’ing you all the time and you never reply and I haven’t heard from your in a long ass time, I thought you just disappeared. I talked to pride force a little bit as well but you never reply on MSN

If you ever want me to help get Px going again then talk to me sometime on msn![/quote]

Wth then msn is screwed up, I’ve been pming you for weeks and you haven’t replied. Wow… I’ll email you. Edit: Opps wrong name xD

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

Lol,

Looks nice and I saw this on your MSN status

I’ve been MSN’ing you all the time and you never reply and I haven’t heard from your in a long ass time, I thought you just disappeared. I talked to pride force a little bit as well but you never reply on MSN

If you ever want me to help get Px going again then talk to me sometime on msn!

item.title: Proximity
item.dc:creator: @Stupit Stu
item.description:
@Stupit wrote:

[quote=“Proximity, post:12, topic:395738”][quote author=Kono-chan link=topic=492929.msg3603829#msg3603829 date=1305889809]

I’d like to see something of the website.

Currently just put together a simple template, to get it started with http://proximity-rs.com/

So far, I see nothing unique about this, I do like the client though.

Well I did just create this topic about 15 mins ago… So thats to be expected, more will gradually be added. >w>

Site looks alright. Are you going to be using PHP or anything in it? Because if styling is all you can do…
[/quote]

Nothing more then the hiscores atm… I don’t know much PHP, so I’m not sure, but it will be needed. T^T

i lost interest there but nice client the background kinda reminds me of wow lich king

Thanks

that is a fucking amasing login screen

Thank you xD First time making a custom one, it came out a lot better then I had expected…[/quote]
Could you PM me where you learnt to do custom login screens, I’d really like to know.

Read full topic

that is a fucking amasing login screen
Thank you xD First time making a custom one, it came out a lot better then I had expected..

[ul][list][list][center][shadow=black,left][font=impact][size=60pt]Proximity[/size][/font][/shadow]
[ http://proximity-rs.com ]

[/center]

[font=verdana][shadow=#9cc,bottom][s]The goal of Proximity is to be as unique as possible, we’ll contain a wide verity of different types of gameplay for all types of players. Although most of our content and priority will be focused around a pvp system on which we have come up with. It will keep both the original sense of Runescape pking, with an addictive addition. For the time being the client, gfx, and website are being developed by Alex(Mr GigGles), and the server by Ashton. Both of us were the original developers of OverloadX back in its prime around December. We both have experience in running a successfully large scale server and plan to make this one even better! At the moment there isn’t much media of what we have completed, and some of which we aren’t showing until release. We are currently in alpha stages, and should be in a very early beta within a month. The clients deop is 317, with 602 animations and gfx, 641 items, 508 maps, 562 npcs. The server is PI based.[/s]
